subject: Horse Racing
Kentucky Derby
lead_paragraph: Big Drama, a colt who won five of his six starts as a 2-year-old, is out of the running for the Kentucky Derby after kicking himself in his stall in January. Big Drama turned in a solid workout March 1, but the trainer David Fawkes and the owner-breeder Harold Queen chose not to point toward the Derby, which will be run May 2. drama.
